author: TrustyJAID
description: Gather hockey information from nhl.com and display in discord.
install_msg: Use `[p]hockey`, `[p]hockeyset` and `[p]gdc` to see what commands are available. If you want the emojis to work please ask <@218773382617890828> to add your bot to his server hosting the emojis.
name: Hockey
